segments.pli: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Someone with three qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena—
segments.en: Unskillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: Someone with these three qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: Someone with three qualities is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena—
segments.en: Skillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: Someone with these three qualities is raised up to heaven.”

sections.title: “Someone with three qualities is cast down to hell.…

suttaplex.blurb: Wholesome and unwholesome deeds determine rebirth.
